attributes.action: Reduce the time limit for Abortion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the current law, abortion can happen up to 24 weeks. We want to lower this limit. A baby can survive at 24 with help (much like adults may need help to survive). Lowering the time limit will ensure that the baby could not have survived without help. This is more humane.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to Reduce the time limit for Abortion."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19567


Prime Minister's Office
